metadata.title: CVE-2021-43666 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in mbed TLS 3.0.0 and earlier in the mbedtls_pkcs12_derivation function when an input password's length is 0.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
